function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Informal urban settlements with limited access to healthcare may experience a rapid spread of contagious diseases due to overcrowding and inadequate sanitation.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and high mortality rates within the settlements, as well as potential spillover to surrounding areas.","Mitigation":"Improving access to healthcare, sanitation, and public health education within informal urban settlements.","Technologies":"Mobile health clinics, community health workers, sanitation infrastructure, and digital health tools for education and monitoring.","People":"Residents of informal urban settlements, surrounding communities, and healthcare workers.","Owner":"Government, NGOs, and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Lack of official recognition and support for informal settlements may result in limited access to healthcare resources and public health interventions.","Impact":"Inequitable distribution of healthcare resources, increased vulnerability to contagious diseases, and challenges in implementing public health measures.","Mitigation":"Advocating for official recognition of informal settlements, allocation of resources, and inclusion in public health planning and interventions.","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping, digital health records, and community engagement platforms.","People":"Residents of informal settlements, policymakers, and public health authorities.","Owner":"Community organizations, advocacy groups, and government agencies."}]}
